casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Randy Lynn ATKINS. No. 9A94-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 1, 2006. Paul Green, Durham, Jonathan L. Megerian, Asheboro, for Randy Lynn Atkins. Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of May 2006 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Response to Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

*464"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of June 2006."
